programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Things are still tense between Nathan and Katelyn after he threatened to run away from home again. Adina insists on being Helmi's primary caregiver and the Hassans worry it will have a detrimental effect on her.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) 'Don't eat carbs if you are trying to lose weight' Sounds familiar but is this true? How can we be smarter about our carbs so that we can have our cake and eat it too?

programme.title: Food Chase
programme.desc: The cast of Ah Boys to Men, Tosh Zhang, Hafiz Aziz, Noah Yap, and Apple Chan are taking on Food Chase in Toa Payoh. Noah and Apple claim to have a god on their team while Tosh and Hafiz get a surprise at the final location. Who will be the one chugging The Drink?

programme.desc: One of America's most popular and beloved game shows, "Deal or No Deal", is back with it iconic host Howie Mandel.

programme.title: P.I.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Acclaimed chef Luke Nguyen's journey continues along the mighty Mekong River where he visits his relatives who live on a tributary of the delta.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S11
programme.desc: Martha Stewart is back with an incredible 11th series of Martha Bakes, packed with mouthwatering pies, impressive cakes and the most delicious cookies. Martha is passionate about using the best ingredients possible, and in this series, we'll join her for a lesson with the experts who grow and produce the key ingredients that every baker needs to take their food from ordinary to extraordinary.

programme.title: Mental Samurai
programme.desc: From the producers of "American Ninja Warrior" and "The Voice" comes the ultimate challenge of both mind and body. programme.title: Xavier Riddle And The Secret Museum S1
programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: BM Corp's animal experiments have created powerful megabeasts. The Animal Rescue team continues to fight through a tough battle against the unknown enemy. Jean is suspicious of Rody and all the other animals, so she sneaks into the underground security unit and sees the battle on the monitor. She helps the Animal Rescue team from the security unit to identify animals trapped inside the megabeasts.

programme.title: Bugsville
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Captain Redbeard is behaving strangely and only a special berry juice made by Parrot can calm him down, but he's missing! Tim searches for Parrot while the others try to recreate the juice. Pig and Panda are making a monster movie and Tim wants to be the heroic star. However, he keeps getting other roles while he watches the rest do exciting things. Will Time get his moment to shine?

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: There's a new collection of Golde and Navy toys, and the Imp is determined to collect every last one of them. Unfortunately, his quest to obtain the rarest toy lands him in unexpected trouble.

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde
programme.desc: Join the Enchantimals on their exciting adventures, where they head to Frozenwood in search of an ice cream that never melts and visit Grazy Grasslands, to help Merrit Monkey and Cherish Cheetah Enchantimals find the cure for hiccupitis!

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: It's Christmas time, and Rose is excited to find out that Santa Claus really exists. The Snow Queen starts a big duel with Santa, and the heroes are forced to replace him and deliver all the Christmas presents. Rose is happy: this is the perfect chance to let her friends and their families discover Christmas magic again!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: A series of past events set the stage for the friendships and adventures of the present!

programme.title: Groom My Room S11
programme.desc: Who do you call when you're sharing a room that's filled with old rickety furniture? Brothers Aaron and Amir know exactly what to do and seek the help of host Charmian Tan and her Groom My Room Dream Team. Together they set out to re-write the future of their dull room and cover the walls with hand-drawn comics and self-penned stories about their favourite action heroes.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Daigo pretends to be a fan of Valt, and challenges him to a friendly match. Valt gets angry when he discovers that Daigo's motives weren't as friendly as they seemed. He vows to improve his Rush Launch. As it turns out, Valt also needs to master controlling his own emotions, which proves to be just as hard as mastering his new move.

programme.title: Open Homes S2
programme.desc: Starting in the Melbourne CBD Dea showcases 4 levels of architectural brilliance, Mike heads to a quaint town in Rural NSW and at the climax we head to acclaimed architect Shaun Lockyers latest masterpiece in Brisbane.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Food Notes embarks on a Dim Sum trail in Hong Kong! Check out the most iconic dim sum dishes and find out more about the interesting varieties of siew mai available. If you're a Dim Sum connoisseur, don't miss out on our visit to the first dim sum place here to be awarded one Michelin star!

programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: Exams! SA1 is around the corner, throwing the mothers into major disarray as they scramble to catch up with all the lost time to revise with their cubs. Marcus and Min Yi race against time - and each other - to best prepare Kai for his exams. At the hospital, the Queen of the Lion pride, Chae Lian, is determined to do what it takes to get discharged for her children's exam preparations - but she learns that not everything can be within her reign.

programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: Reza begins to wonder if there is another side to his influential client when they begin to spend more time behind the scenes. Reza's instincts also put him on guard and alert him to secure issues in his domestic affairs too when he senses hints of a growing attraction between Durrani and the new Mr Hunk in her office. At home, Nabilah is envious and seeks her mother's attention but her anger is quelled thanks to her tutor, her knight in shining armour. But Claude is not all he seems...

programme.title: NINJAGO - Secrets Of The Forbidden Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Series centres on the fictional world of Ninjago, telling the story of a group of teen Ninja and their battles against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2

programme.title: 气候变换
programme.desc: 替代线性经济的是循环经济。概念就是，所生产的东西都会回归系统里，没有浪费，就算是废物，也可以重新想象成资源。每项资源都获得重生，甚至是多次重生的机会。循环经济就是以大自然为榜样，在自然界中，组装过程采用材料的方式非常有效，因为几何图形本来就存在。我们需要对我们和大自然，以及生态系统的关系更有意识，同时认真看待，并学会一种和谐的共存方式。.
